casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kevin CROW. No. 45P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. John K. Fanney, Raleigh, for Kevin Crow. *496Hal F. Askins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of February 2006 by the Attorney General to Deem State's Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
